mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tb(username, password, nick_name, email, birth_date, gender, external) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{external})
mapper.update: update user_tb set password = #{password} where id = #{id}

select.if: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.user_role, ur.role, u.nick_name FROM user_tb AS u LEFT JOIN user_role_tb AS ur ON u.user_role = ur.id
